string-array.name: logs_suggessions
string-array.item: Drink a lot of water to stay hydrated!
Don\'t forget to change your napkin in every 6 hours!
Mood swings are natural! Try to munch on a chocolate bar, it helps!
Take enough rest to keep your body energetic!
Try hot bags to calm your belly cramps!
Take enough rest to keep your body energetic!
Don\'t forget to change your napkin in every 6 hours!
Eat healthy and keep yourself strong.

string-array.name: logs_suggessions_pregnant
string-array.item: Hey! Your Ovulation has started, it\'s the lucky time!
There is a chance to get pregnant, try today!
You are the most fertile today, there is a high chance to get pregnant!
If you haven\'t tried yet, don\'t miss the chance! It\'s still a fertile day!
Last day to get pregnant on this cycle, don\'t miss it!

resources.string: It seems that only fragments of the original text remain in the Lorem Ipsum texts used today. One may speculate that over the course of time certain letters were added or deleted at various positions within the text. This might also explain why one can now find slightly different versions. Due to the age of the Lorem Ipsum text there are no copyright issues to contend with.

string.name: fragment_two_set_the_date_in_the_calender
string.u: Set the date in the calender

resources.string: I need accurate predictions of favourable days for conception
I just want to track my cycle
I want to receive cycle predictios
When did your last period start?
On avarage, How long is \nyour period?
On avarage, How long is \nyour cycle??
The cycle prediction will be more accurate if the app get your age.
We will send you reminders about the begining of a new cycle so that you don\'t forget to long it. You can change the text of the reminders in the settings.
